SELECT * FROM ( select rownum as RNUM, A.* from ( select b.*, s.stock_qty from book b join stock s on b.book_no = s.book_no where b.book_writer like '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%' or book_title like '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%' and book_useflag = 'Y' )A )
WHERE RNUM > #{firstRecordIndex} and RNUM <= #{firstRecordIndex} + #{recordCountPerPage}

SELECT count(*) FROM ( select rownum as RNUM, A.* from ( select b.*, s.stock_qty from book b join stock s on b.book_no = s.book_no where b.book_writer like '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%' or book_title like '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%' and book_useflag = 'Y' )A )

SELECT count(*) FROM ( select rownum as RNUM, A.* from ( select * from book where ( book_title like '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%' or book_writer like '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%' ) and book_category = #{bookCategory} and book_useflag = 'Y' )A )

select * from ( select o.productno, p.productname, sum(quantity) totalQty from ORDERS_DETAIL o join book b on o.productno = p.productno and book_useflag = 'Y' and b.categoryno = (select book_category from book where book_no = #{book_no}) group by o.book_no, b.book_title ORDER BY totalQty DESC )
where rownum <= 4
